msbt.message: I bet that was some poor kid's homework and they got in trouble for not turning it in
Aww, I wish I had wings. Then I could fly around collecting !Actually, that sounds kinda hard. I'd probably just collect one and then take a nap.
Wow, people were huuuuuge back when they made this statue! I'm glad I don't live in a time of giants now!
Ooh, I know this one. It's a painting of my mom! <10_4 />A huh huh huhjust kidding. It's a photo of her.
Oh, Where can I get an inflatable clam shell like that?I wanna float in the ocean and sip on !
I always get kinda sweaty when I look at this painting. There's just too much going on for me!
Whoa, this painting is huge! It's so big, there's a guy making a painting WITHIN the painting!
Ooh, it looks like they're playing capture the flag in this painting. I love that game!Last time I captured the flag within the first two minutes!<10_4 /> But then it turned out to be my own shirt
My swimming instructor would tell her to straighten her back for a better back float, .
My mom only had two rules when I was a kid.Don't talk to strangers, and don't paddle out to creepy islands in your boat!
The picnic in this painting always makes me hungry. Do you think they had back then?
I like how this painting is all swirly and mysterious! Oh, but now I'm getting dizzy looking at it
I get seasick in real life, but I never get sick of seeing this painting, a huh huh huh!
That little statue seems kinda angry and scary Maybe it would be happier with a fun uniform and cape!
A huh huh huh! What a funny little statue! <10_4 />Waitit doesn't look like me, does it?
Ooh, yeah, I know how this statue feels. It's like" or for lunch?"
Wait a secyou're the one who donated this, right?<10_4 /> , that's so cool! I bet Blathers loved it!
